column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I've taken family in town here
column3: and simply been here with friends. The staff is super friendly and the food is delicious! Great vegetarian option
column4: strong drinks and always clean and tidy. The noise level is 4.5/5 very loud! The host stand is well-versed in large parties and reservations running late. Your entire party has to be present to be checked in
column5: then you're grouped into another waiting area (near the bar!) to be seated once your table has been set and server is ready for you.
